SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsoft.client.ui.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsoft.client.ui.UI
polimi.ingsoft.client.ui.gui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GUI extends UI
The GUI class represents the graphical user interface for the client. It extends the UI class and provides methods to interact with the GUI components.
See Also:
